Review.Contenu: Ordered £500 earphones,  not delivered.  Linsoul have said that they know that they have not been delivered.  They are waiting for the package to be returned,  waiting weeks now, and are unable to simply send a new order until they receive the parcel from the courier.  This has taken almost a month.  Really bad customer service,  will never buy from them again

The item was in stock and I payed for express shipping, customer service say that it wasn't in order and the timeframe that is express shipping is when they get the product. And that timeframe is 3 to 7 days, will not touch anything more frome this company or even consider ordering anything else.

Review.Titre: DO NOT PURCHASE ANYTHING FROM HERE
Review.Contenu: DO NOT PURCHASE ANYTHING FROM HERE. They sent me a defective amplifier, and wanted ME to pay to send it back to china! The cost of mailing a 50lb amplifier back is ridiculous.

HORRIBLE EXPERIENCE! Had a defective IEM and they gave me the run around and wouldn't let me exchange or send replacement until I "smashed the Iems with a hammer" a whole week for them to even offer a solution. After sending them video evidence they still never sent them. SCAM!!! Buy elsewhere - hifigo, penonaudio, amazon.

Review.Titre: Linsoul asked me to commit a crime.
Review.Contenu: I bought a Simgot Fermat on November 16, the box arrived yesterday and there was a Moondrop Moonriver 2Ti instead of what I paid for.Of course, knowing all the hoops that Linsoul puts in place to avoid doing right by the customer, I made the unboxing video they ask for in their policy, sent them all the proof required and got an email saying that I had five days to return the product at my own expense with no real assurances that I would be reimbursed besides "trust me bro" and then wait an unspecified amount of time for their quality control to inspect the product (which is still factory sealed, mind you).Again with no time estimates about it, basically a BS way to wait out the customer protection time window of my payment method.So far, part for the course for Linsoul according to their policy but my jaw truly dropped when the email also stated:"8) Please also help to declare the value at $30 to help to process the customs clearance."Which is a crime in every jurisdiction I know.Of course I escalated the issue to PayPal and if that doesn't pan out, I'll simply call my bank and say I was scammed, which is precisely what happened, I'm also letting Chinese authorities know about their charming little tax evasion practices.I've had issues with online businesses before but asking me to defraud customs is a solid first.Funny because they change their tune completely when selling through Amazon but whatever.My problem is that Linsoul pays YouTubers to say that they are the most trustworthy and honest of the ChiFi bunch but when it comes the time where they have to be honest, they ask me to commit a crime on their behalf while doing everything in their power to delay my return process until I effectively lose customer protection from my payment method.Worse still, only after the fact I became aware of the terrible reviews and horror stories regarding Linsoul on HeadFi and Trustpilot.Do not do business with Linsoul, if you absolutely have to, do it through Amazon because they cannot hold your money for ransom there.Regarding their answer, yes, only after I escalated the issue to PayPal they proposed a DHL label but what their answer forgot to mention was that the label would be sent (or not) on the condition that I drop the complaint with PayPal first.I don't know why do they think I would trust them enough to do that but there they are.Get over yourself Linsoul, you will send me a return label and reimburse me alright but just because PayPal will force you to, otherwise I'd still be stuck in your shady RMA and without my money.Not today and certainly not with me.

This company has really poor QC and customer service. I will here only talking about their own brand Thieaudio but what you can expect is a good sounding product with a very short lifetime period. They make cheaper products ok but the very bad quality plus the money you'll spend in shipping + repair and on top all the hassle it requires to get the job done is definitely not worth it. Better spare a bit more and get products that match your expectations because those guys won't. You can be lucky but if you search a bit online, you'll see that their products are unfortunately not reliable despite the fact that they might sound good.

Review.Titre: All they want is your money, avoid.
Review.Contenu: They will charge you 35% of the items RRP for restocking (putting a thin layer of plastic around the earphone box) even if you open it briefly to ensure that nothing is damaged or missing (they even recommend taking a video of this proces, but it makes no difference). They will charge you for items returned in perfect condition. Severe lack of trust in the consumer. You have to pay for the return and 'restocking', you are liable for damaged/missing items, you are a fool to buy from this company.

Review.Titre: I purchased a Linksoul/Goat Hill hat…
Review.Contenu: I purchased a Linksoul/Goat Hill hat last year. I have worn it possibly 6 times. The sweat band that covers my forehead has shrunk. As a result of wearing the hat for 4 hours my forehead is embedded with deep indentations. The band was not preshrunk prior to assembly. Linksoul nor Goat Hill want to help remedy the problem. The hat is in near perfect condition, but now cannot wear the hat.

Review.Titre: Don't Buy Direct! Use Amazon Marketplace!
Review.Contenu: Leaving a review on their website will post your full name publicly. Even if you enter a screen name, or just your first name when it asks, it will just use your order information to alter it to the name on your order. This review will also be posted on a third party website called judge.me which will not only post your full name publicly, but your city of residence as well. Again, they use your order information to do this. The only way to edit this information is to remove it. To delete the review entirely. So if you value your privacy, at least to the extent where isn't just blatantly being posted publicly, I say use their Amazon Marketplace if they have something you want. Don't buy directly from them.

Review.Titre: I ordered a specialized cable and after…
Review.Contenu: I ordered a specialized cable and after much delay, I checked the tracking and it saw it was delivered 2 hours earlier.  I check the mailbox and nothing was delivered.  This happens, so I reached out to their support and they said they will check it out.  They responded that the carrier said it was delivered so its my problem to take up with the carrier.  They advised me to write them a letter so they can get reimbursed.  This should not become my responsibility to track down as I was not the one that engaged with the shipping company.  I will stay far away from them in the future.

It is quite hard to have a worse experience than never receiving the product in the first place, and on top of that, there was no hope for a refund or replacement. I'll need to find a different online audio store in the future.

This is a review of the KZ S2 earphones which I bought from Indiegogo. The quality of this product is poor. I supported the Indiegogo campaign for these earphones and was excited to receive them. When I did, one of them was defective and would not charge or switch on at all. I returned them to the manufacturer in China at the cheapest possible shipping method ($17), but the manufacturer would only reimburse $5 of the shipping cost because that is what it cost them to dispatch from China in the first place. So I got poor quality goods and paid $12 for the privilege.

Review.Titre: Had to pay 80% of the purchase price again for a manufacturing defect.
Review.Contenu: Purchased an iem as a gift, There was a manufacturing defect that was so widespread that the company even reached out to tell their fans that there was a manufacturing defect and that they should reach out to the company if the issue was present. I opened the gift to test it, and had the issue, but since it had been 7 days since I received the item, I was forced to pay $160 which is 80% of the product just to ship it back and get a replacement. On a normal product, I would understand, but when a manufacturer admits there is an issue, you should accept a return at face value. They also have you state the value of the return item is under $30 when shipping which seems a little sketchy to me.
You are spamming my f#king email. I bought one pair of headphones, I never signed up to be f#king bombarded. FFS im sick of companies automatically signing people up! F#ck off!

I bought 2 pairs of blon earphones the mini and the bl03 the mini is just about acceptable where sound is concerned but only on a few tracks which I choose as there not good ..the bl 03 are dreadful. No bass at all I had to virtually ram them in ear to get half a descent sound but pain was to much .I am not a novice to iem's I play guitar and used them many  years I have 9 pairs some cheap some expensive the cheapest £15 and these are so much better than the blon they need to tell the truth on the sales or stop selling inadequate produce which don't match there marketing absolute rubbish I even spent on more eartips and upgrade on cable but still useless sound ..very tinny. There obviously different batches where some are OK and others ( like mine ) are dreadful. Don't buy unless you try on first .crap !!!

Review.Titre: Bought Tin T2 earphones but left failed…
Review.Contenu: Bought Tin T2 earphones but left failed after 8 months. Kept contacting them to get it fixed or replaced or refunded. They offered 10% then 20 then 50%.They flouted Australian law. I wanted to take them to court so they wouldn't bully others but decided against it.
Awful customer service. You will be lied to, messed around & probably never even get the replacement. The company does not take problems seriously, or offer any compensation for mistakes. Avoid.

An unreliable and deceitful company Linsoul is. They send a complete different product than I ordered. Again. This time I am very very sure it wasn’t my fault. Their response: According to our company policy, you cannot exchange it or get a refund. And that is a lie! The product is unused, unopend and sealed. So I lost 55 euros and have a useless product at home…  As the others here on this site also report: beware of this company. They are interested in your money, and don’t care about you at all. This is there way of doing business: our fault is not our problem!Last but not least: according to european law they can be prosecuted for this because of disregard for the applicable rules... Is there a lawyer who can handle this?
Bought earphones direct from their webshop. Took about a month to arrive. One earbud dead on arrival. I'm expected now to pay to ship them back for a refund.

Review.Titre: after cancelling my order with no…
Review.Contenu: after cancelling my order with no reasoning, they actually kept the tips I gave them. no more Linsoul for me, ever.
They sent me a faulty hi res dap 400£. After 2 weeks of emailing. They wanted me to pay for repair, post, covid cleaning etc. Never do business with them again!

Review.Titre: Defective Left driver when used brand…
Review.Contenu: Defective Left driver when used brand new, out if box. Ask Sally in Linsoul support.

Review.Titre: Bad customer service and slow shippers.
Review.Contenu: Bad customer service and slow shippers.products is good though

Review.Titre: We have not received the order.

Review.Contenu: A loyal customer, despite having to pay to return faulty items. This is clearly mentioned in their T&C, so not unexpected. Part of the risk when sourcing on the cheap (keep this in mind). Twice from less than 10 purchase - (different) product fail rate is >10%.A recent order was supplied incorrectly, with a $25 TWS IEM sent, rather than the $190 dongle DAC I ordered and paid for (including duties). Rather than just crediting me immediately, I was told to place another order for the same cheap TWS IEM. They would ship me my DAC. (I got a $10 discount on an item I never ordered nor have any use for. [LINSOUL, the correct remedy would be to CREDIT YOUR CUSTOMER IMMEDIATELY for your mistake, not find a convoluted way of reducing your $15 loss.] Then they shipped me another cheap TWS IEM, no DAC! I paid for the International Express shipping. Now I have 2 pairs of a cheap product I never ordered - one I gifted to a friend, the other I sold at a loss. After waiting for more than 2months for a shipment of the DAC I originally ordered and paid for, they agreed to refund me one shipping cost and give me a voucher for the original amount I paid (less my duties and fees). The (faulty) voucher did not work, but this was eventually resolved by Linsoul. I am currently waiting my last shipment from Linsoul. There are other shopping options out there. I lost $$ over the past year, because I chose to buy from Linsoul.

Review.Titre: The response time is pretty good so…
Review.Contenu: The response time is pretty good so far, but my product came not working. I recorded a video of the product you asked for, but after recieving not working product i would imagine quick replacement. Nothing happening in this was so far.d

I'm rating linsoul, just after I bought this (thieaudio ghost), they came down in price, there was a promotion, there was no offer to price match into that promotion for some credit or store credit, it was a lukewarm experience.

Review.Titre: The delivery company left it outside…
Review.Contenu: The delivery company left it outside and didn’t leave any info, my good neighbour pick up for me

Review.Titre: Longer shipping time than I had expected
Review.Contenu: I was not aware that the item was shipping from China and, while I enjoy my purchase, I didn't like having to wait for so long for it. So, I would likely shop elsewhere in the future.

Review.Titre: Excellent products, weird customer service practices
Review.Contenu: My items from Linsoul arrived on time and the use of DHL over the joke that Fedex and UPS have become was much appreciated. However, my item went on discounted sale 3 days after my order was placed and I could not get support to come to any sort of agreement on honoring that new discount whether via store credit or a partial refund. This is something other Hi-Fi stores, such as Apos, will often do, so I was disappointed.
It's usually take some time, to dispatch bought item but it is always as it was described. So everything as told :)

Review.Titre: Found it easy to shop and track my…
Review.Contenu: Found it easy to shop and track my package. Package also showed up in great condition. This would be a 5 star review but shipping really took longer than I would hope for but that make sense considering all these products come straight out of china

Review.Titre: Keep going Linsoul  You are getting there
Review.Contenu: Because I live in the States I still do not like how sometimes the product takes so long to arrive However it feels like the waiting Period Is getting shorter As time goes on

Having bought and returned a Linsoul in ear monitor lead to Amazon as I was shipped one with the wrong connector type I decided to try the company directly via their own web site. There was far more choice available directly from them and I ended up changing my mind about the cable I wanted and upgrading to an $89 ( yes 89 USD which seemed a bit crazy to me) MMCX 2.5mm balanced cable. It arrived in the UK and I paired it with my Westone UM40 Pro buds and my Astell & Kern SP1000M. Wow !!! I cannot stress enough the difference the cable has made to my listening experience. I used to regularly listen at a 120-130 volume level (out of a 0-150 range) and have dropped that to 100-110 at most. The sound is amazingly clear and defined. They also clip in and connect perfectly which prior leads I've owned haven't and I've had no glitches. It is incredible. In terms of service the email comms are good and I have only dropped this review to 4 stars from what would have been a 5 star review as I feel the delivery, especially the dispatch phase, was a little slow.
Overall quality of service from initial order to receipt of product was quite good. The only thing I was not pleased with was the tracking of the package was not always up to date.

It normally takes a while For the items that I have purchased to arrive from you guys I assume because I do live in the States However this time  The wait seemed a little shorter and that was a pleasant surprise
I haven't recurved the package yet but I can't complain, the service so far has been great. They got it out to the U.S in about a week and a half so I'm expecting my package soon
Reasonable fast delivery for some items, but then slow on others.

Review.Titre: Ordered Tape IEMs a year ago
Review.Contenu: Ordered Tape IEMs a year ago. They arrived and were of good quality. I have not attempted to use their costumer services.
Delivery is delayed a few weeks. Works as described!
Excellent product but the shipping took a long time
Shipping was decently quick, product was as advertised, website straightforward and decent to navigate.
The product is excellent and it arrived safe and sound.

Review.Titre: It’s kinda take too long to receive.

Review.Contenu: The purchase worked fine. Delivery time to Austria about 3 weeks, very good product at an affordable price. Will definitely buy again.

Review.Titre: Very happy with the whole purchase
Review.Contenu: Very happy with the whole purchase, really pleased with the headphones , well balanced with very good bass , very happy to buy another set!

Sent my item quickly even though the store page said "pre-order". Kiwi Ears quintet is amazing, way better than the 7hz Timeless they are replacing. Linsoul customer support is great, didn't need it for the last purchase but when my Timeless came defective they RMA'd a replacement as soon as they received the first.

Review.Titre: Very good service and fast delivery

Review.Contenu: Very fast, very competitive pricing, good support. Any time again.

I’ve been purchasing audio products, such as in ear, monitors, and Dongles from Linsoul for over three years now and when I had a problem they were able to help me get the problem resolved shipping. May take some time, but what do you expect? It’s from China but my packages arrive along with shipping info for tracking.
Ordered from Europe, came within 2 weeks with good tracking. No damage to package, and arrived as expected, everything working fine.
The whole process was smooth, as usual, and the headphones arrived a lot faster than I expected.

Review.Titre: The place to go for audio gears
Review.Contenu: Fast communication, very responsive, as long as it's within their terms and conditions, you'll be well taken care of. Website has a large catalogue of audio products that'll suit your every audio need. Highly recommended

Linsoul is a great site for Chi-Fi gear. I had an issue with receiving an incorrect item and the customer service response was excellent, quickly looking into what had happened and then offered options what could be done to make me happy.

Review.Titre: A very smooth, trouble free purchasing experience
Review.Contenu: Great selection of product's at good prices, and additionally for me, living in New Zealand the fast frieght all the way down under is fantastic.A very smooth, trouble free purchasing experience.CheersCliff
Fast, no taxes when ordering to EU. Product arrived in perfect condition and well packaged.

Overall, my experience has been great! I like to shop at Linsoul when I don't see the products I want on Amazon, and often I'll find a very satisfying deal or promotion here. The selection is pretty well curated - I always see highly recommended stuff for sale. Checkout is very easy and all my purchases have arrived on time.

Review.Titre: Good prices and very good customer service
Review.Contenu: Ordered a digital audio player (Hiby R3 Pro Saber) when it was on offer. Customer service replied immediately when I wanted to change colour. Although it took a few days before they shipped it, everything went fine. The player arrived in Germany without any problems just a few days later (with DHL Express).Also placed an order some weeks ago for some headphones but cancelled it again. Here also customer service was quick and refunded the amount immediately.Can definitely recommend Linsoul for getting quality audio gear for a good price.
Order quickly dispatched and received as quickly (via DHL).The IEM cable I ordered was well packaged and arrived safely.Excellent experience from my end.
Not as fast as ordering from Amazon but efficient for being shipped around the world.

Review.Titre: received product fairly fast and in…
Review.Contenu: received product fairly fast and in great condition. well packaged to prevent damage
good place to get best gear

Faster delivery than expected with a high quality product. The KZ SK10s are amazing earbuds with the quality of IEMS they're such a good product. I'll be sure to recommend them to everyone looking for headphones

Review.Titre: Ordered a pair of blon bl-03 reduced to…
Review.Contenu: Ordered a pair of blon bl-03 reduced to $26 an amazing bargain delivery to the Uk took less than a week with great customer support instantly answered via email. Highly recommended for any Uk customers to save money vs Amazon
Amazing, love this store!

After many orders from Linsoul I have yet to have an issue. And this most recent order was the same. Shipping from China to Australia was speedy, the package was securely packed, and it arrived in pristine condition. The price of the item was very competitive, and I am very happy with it.
Great communication. Ship on time and fairly fast to Europe. Never had a bad experience with Linsoul. 5 stars and recommended....
Honestly 10/10. I live in Africa, ordered on Sunday, got the package on Friday. Quality control is superb, package packed securely. Would definitely order from Linsoul again!

Every time I order from Linsoul the Posting is always Rapid and the service and updates before delivery are always impeccable to the UK.Apart from the QKZ x HBB and Salnotes Zero IEM’s I ordered are simply Superb Sounding and would recommend Both without doubt considering the pair are both available for less than £40GBP.

Review.Titre: The selection of products is excellent
Review.Contenu: The selection of products is excellent. The pricing is competitive if not lower than other sources. The delivery from China was initially a concern, having had some long drawn-out experiences with other China-based retail companies. I was pleasantly surprised to have a prompt tracking and delivery schedule that will have me purchase from them again.
Did my First Order in this Shop on a IEM-Set. Took only 8 days to deliver to Germany.I'm very satisfied with the Product and Service.
Big choice, good prices, helpful communication and fast shipping. In one word: GREAT 👍👍👍👍👍

Review.Titre: One of my favourite audio stores
Review.Contenu: I bought several IEMs and audio accessories from Linsoul. So far no problem whatsoever. Fast shipping and the goods were packaged well. Recommended
It almost a month but i never left hopes i knew LIN will able to deliver and my god what a product just loved it

Review.Titre: Grate website to buy audio products
Review.Contenu: I’ve been buying from linsoul since 2020 never had a problem and love the community they made on discord.
Excellent service as always. Fast posting, well packaged (little waste), good prices & great selection of products.
The purchase experience is simple and effective.The shipping was reliably to trace and the product was delivered within a fair time
first of all the delivery was very fast. secondly the earphones are phenomenal highly recommended for just 20$!
Reliable brand, everything I bought has come in good time, well packed. As advertised!
Great products very useful, quick delivery
Delivery to Ireland was fast, I was impressed
First time ordering from linsoul. I got the raptgo hook x and dunu vulkan. Both arrived in a timely manner and great price.
Fast international delivery, well packed, very happy with my purchase.

Review.Titre: Great service everytime I've used them.
Review.Contenu: Always fast dispatch,Well packed,Proper tracking.👍
Got here earlier than expected.  First impression are incredible value for money.

Everything was smooth and silky. I’ve bought a Salnotes Zero headphone, and it arrived in time, and I did not have to worry about taxes either. It seems like they took care of it, or they shipped from inside of EU. Thanks anyways! Saved me a lot of trouble.
Easy buying process, quick postage with tracking. Good to have quick service without the need to buy through Amazon.
Excellent service.Linsoul ships your order quickly with proper regional tracking.Their customer service is also excellent with speedy and polite response.

Review.Titre: Great store for your HiFi needs
Review.Contenu: Great prices, quick and free shipping to my country. The staffs were helpful and resolved any query I had in timely manner.

Review.Titre: I purchased the Athena headphones and I…
Review.Contenu: I purchased the Athena headphones and I am very happy with them. They arrived quickly and seem to be a great value for a lower priced Headphone.

Review.Titre: I have had numerous purchases from…
Review.Contenu: I have had numerous purchases from Linsoul and they have delivered the orders in a timely and efficient manner. Ordering is easy and intuitive.

Review.Titre: Purchase went as smooth as butter!

Review.Contenu: Order was accurate, arrived quickly in perfect condition, and I got it at a great price!
Fast delivery, well secured shipment, thank you very much.

Review.Titre: A good and reliable source for your Hifi needs
Review.Contenu: I've bought a few things here and there from Linsoul. Never had any issues, and always shipped fast.
Very responsive customer service that quickly sorted out some issues with clearing customs for me and fast shipping.
Fast and easy purchase. Delivery was fast!
Recommedation, great shop, fast delivery, good price and offer, best service, thank you
Perfect delivery , nice iem's , very good website for audio stuff .
My first order from Linsoul, the experience is so far so good.
Seamless experience both with the store and the product
The updates for shipping were good. It took about 7 days to arrive.
Fast shipping.  Reliable seller.  Thank you.
Great value product...arrived fast.Items sound great...comfortable too.

Excellent experience, swift post, very responsive, few dealings with Linsoul and perfect as always highly recommended thank you.
Package arrived fast and safely, thank you very much!
Very fast delivery, no hidden charges, excellent service, thanks.
good support, fast delivery, everything okay
